Title: On the sectorial property of the Caputo derivative operator
Abstract: © 2015 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.In this note, we establish the sectorial property of the Caputo fractional derivative operator of order α ∈ (1,2) with a zero Dirichlet boundary condition.
